h1: Jack in the Box Chicken Sandwich Calories

query.item: Jack in the Box chicken sandwich

assumptions: Standard menu item: breaded chicken fillet, lettuce, tomato, mayo on sesame seed bun; values from official or averaged data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and menu changes. Check Jack in the Box app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Jack in the Box Chicken Sandwich provides ~460 kcal and ~25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Jack in the Box chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 460 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Jack in the Box chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: About 25 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Jack in the Box chicken sandwich calories info?
faqs.a: Around 1000 mg of sodium, mostly from breading and bun.

faqs.q: Are Jack in the Box chicken sandwich calories high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, ~50 g carbs mainly from the bun and breading.

faqs.q: Can I make Jack in the Box chicken sandwich lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for grilled chicken or skip mayo to reduce by 90–100 kcal.
